venue_info.venue_address: 澳門路氹望德聖母灣大馬路

project_info:
票价说明：
澳门币票价MOP： 2199/  1999 / 1699 / 1399 / 999 / 699
人民币售价CNY：1999元/ 1819元/ 1539元/ 1269元 / 909元 / 639元
门票已含境外（含港澳台）服务费
 
配送说明：
本项目门票不支持退换，不可转让。一人一票，入场时必需持有有效门票。购票成功的客户，请您提前办理好港澳通行证-中国澳门签注。门票将于演出前一周左右寄出。当天如出现遗失或忘带门票情况不予处理，感谢您的支持与理解。
 

演出介绍：
[NCT 127 4TH TOUR 'NEO CITY : MACAU - THE MOMENTUM'] 售票公告 TICKET ANNOUNCEMENT
 
⏰演出日期Date：2025.04.26 (SAT) 7PM & 2025.04.27 (SUN) 6PM
（实际演出时间以现场状况为准Actual performance time based on on-site situation）
📍演出地点Venue: 银河综艺馆GALAXY ARENA
 
官方售票Official Ticketing:
-大麦APP (https://detail.damai.cn/item.htm?id=862363785744)
 
▶ NCTzen 127 MEMBERSHIP(GL)会员优先订票：12月27日（五）中午12时至下午8时59分仅限于DAMAI发售
▶ NCTzen 127 MEMBERSHIP(GL) Pre-sale: December 27th (FRI) at 12 PM ~ 08:59 PM (CST) at DAMAI ONLY
※如欲成为会员或查询有关信息，请浏览https://weverse.io/nct127/notice/24189
 以参与会员优先购票。
※Visit https://weverse.io/nct127/notice/24189 for membership and pre-sale access.
 
▶ 公开发售：12月28日（六）中午12点 ~
▶ General On Sale: December 28th (SAT) at 12PM (CST)~
 
*请于售票前预先确认各售票平台支持之付款方式及配送票券规则。
Please Pre-Check each ticketing system’s payment method and tickets delivery restrictions before proceeding your purchase.
*无论是会员预售还是公开发售，各位都记得要预先注册为各票务网站会员才可购票。
Must complete ticketing website member registration before proceeding any ticket purchase. 
 
🎫 票价 Ticket Price:
-NEO CITY PACAKAGE MOP 2199
*STANDING * 1 (INCLUDE SOUND CHECK PARTY)
*POST CARD SET (MACAU EXCLUSIVE/ Day 1 & Day 2 are different photos)
-MOP 1,999 PLATINUM SEATED
-MOP 1,699 CAT 1 SEATED
-MOP 1,399 CAT 2 SEATED
-MOP 999 CAT 3 SEATED
-MOP 699 CAT 4 SEATED
-RESTRICTED VIEW ZONE
 
*视线受阻区可能无法观赏完整舞台You may be unable to see the entire stage from the Restricted view seats.
*站区票面有序号，请依票面序号排整队入场。人身安全起见，孕妇及身高未满140公分或未满12岁孩童，请勿购买站区票券，主办方将有权谢绝入场。STANDING entry is with queue number. For safety reasons, pregnant women and children under 140 cm or 12 years old are not allowed to enter STANDING area.
* 座位区皆为划位座席，请依票面座位号入座。Each SEATED ticket is assigned a specific seat.
 
* NCTzen 127 MEMBERSHIP(GL)会员预购每笔ID每场限购2张票券，公开售票每人每交易限购4张票券。若经核对发现同一会员ID购票数超过2张，主办单位有权取消该票券交易。
Purchase limit is 2 tickets per show for NCTzen 127 MEMBERSHIP(GL) Presale and 4 tickets per show per account for General On Sale. If more than 2 tickets are purchased with the same member ID after verification, the organizer has the right to cancel the ticket transaction.
